summary:
Professional with passion for transforming/managing Supply Chains with 30 yr track record, peoplemanager.  

Used to operate in international, multicultural and complex environments and multi-disciplinary project organisations. Demonstrates analytical, strategic and organizational skills and financial acumen. 
Strong leader with ability to influence people at all levels and drive change.
Focussed on problem solving, operational excellence, continuous improvement. Strong knowledge of ERP systems (SAP and Oracle)

Started career as SC mgr in retail companies. Improved efficiency by means of improvements in wareh operations and inventory management, automation of PoS, implementing EDI with suppliers. Extended wareh ops. Reduced transportation costs. 

I have been consultant SC for 8 years. As project manager I have been involved in major SC transformations:
Design of European distrubition networks; spare parts automotive and professional equipment, FMCG
Outsoucing wareh. and transportation 
Warehouse implementation of improvements to reduce costs and improve service
Distribution centre design/implementation.
Post merger projects retail 
Responible for process/organisation in system implementation
Set up of systems and processes for repair company

Played a leading role during 6 years in transforming European SC of Canon Europe to become cost efficient and more effective. Project resulted in closing down 14 subsidiary wareh. Outsourced major wareh. ops in Slovakia and Russia. Represented SC in corporate risk management. 

As Senior Manager SC execution I led a SC transition program atLG Electronics Europe.

As a director responsible for transformation of samples Supply Chain of Forbo Flooring and implementation SAP.

Hired as project manager to consolidate warehousing and refurbihsment operations of market leader renting out devices to disabled.



Specialties: Retail and Electronics industry
European distribution networks
Continuous improvement
Supply Chain Management
